title.rendered: “IDF Thwarts Missile Attacks from Lebanon: A Detailed Report on Successful Interceptions and Counter-Strikes”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Following the alert in the Yiftach area, Air Defense fighters successfully intercepted six missiles launched from Lebanon. A few minutes later, an Air Force aircraft attacked the launcher and the terrorist cell that carried out the shooting in Lebanon.

In addition, an Air Force aircraft attacked a military building of the Hezbollah terrorist organization in Lebanon, where an organization terrorist cell operated.

Also, as a result of the shooting towards an IDF outpost in the Malkia area earlier today, two IDF reservists were moderately wounded.

The fighters were evacuated for medical treatment in a hospital, their families have been updated.

Attached is the documentation of the attacks: https://bit.ly/3GMnrb3
